content.query:
CREATE TABLE jpmia.CompanyDetail
(
    company_id BIGINT,
    name NVARCHAR(200),
    description NVARCHAR(3000),
    company_size int,
    formatted_company_size NVARCHAR(100),
    state NVARCHAR(100),
    country NVARCHAR(100),
    city NVARCHAR(1000),
    zip_code NVARCHAR(100),
    address NVARCHAR(3000),
    url NVARCHAR(1000),
    industries NVARCHAR(3000),
    specialities NVARCHAR(3000),
    number_of_employees BIGINT,
    number_of_followers BIGINT
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (company_id),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
------------------------------
CREATE TABLE jpmia.JobApplicationRate
(
    work_type NVARCHAR(100),
    application_type NVARCHAR(200),
    posting_domain NVARCHAR(1000),
    no_of_applications BIGINT,
    no_of_views BIGINT,
    application_percentage DECIMAL(18,2)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (work_type),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
-----------------------------
create TABLE jpmia.JobDetail
(
    job_id BIGINT,
benefits NVARCHAR(1000),
inferred INt,
required_skills NVARCHAR(1000),
industries NVARCHAR(1000),
Max_salary_per_annum FLOAT,
Min_salary_per_annum FLOAT,
Med_salary_per_annum FLOAT,
currency NVARCHAR(100),
compensation_type NVARCHAR(200),
locations NVARCHAR(500),
applies INT,	
original_listed_time NVARCHAR(100),	
remote_allowed BIGINT,	
views BIGINT,	
job_posting_url NVARCHAR(1000), 
application_url NVARCHAR(1000),	
application_type NVARCHAR(200),	
expiry NVARCHAR(100),	
closed_time NVARCHAR(100),	
experience_level NVARCHAR(200),	
listed_time NVARCHAR(200),	
posting_domain NVARCHAR(500),	
sponsored NVARCHAR(200),	
work_type NVARCHAR(200),	
scraped NVARCHAR(100)
)
--------
CREATE TABLE jpmia.TopcompaniesWithMoreJobs
(
    company_id BIGINT,
    company_name NVARCHAR(1000),
    experience_level NVARCHAR(500), 
    number_of_jobs_exp_level BIGINT, 
    total_number_of_jobs BIGINT
);

select * from sys.tables;
